activities: Personal data collected and stored by customers of Astute Solutions is secured and protected by use of best practices and continually monitoring of security.  This includes an annual third party penetration test, internal penetration tests and third party security audits.  Astute Solutions does not have any rights to the collected data, therefore has no rights to distribute or sell the data collected.  Astute Solutions will transfer employee and customer data to Astute Solutions’s home office for processing and storage.  This data is used exclusively for employee benefits and communications with customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
